Overview classes¶

matchup.structure.Occurrence Module¶

Occurrence is an encapsulation of:

name of document, frequency of term in document, positions and score

Classes¶

Occurrence([doc, term])

Term(word, position)

matchup.structure.Query Module¶

Represents the Query of the IR service, composite for :

sanitizer, orquestrator and answer

matchup.models.Orchestrator Module¶

The brain of IR algorithms. This module are resposible to execute one model and return the resulted scored document list.
